channel.title: Astro Academia
channel.description: I am a CIFRE PhD student at Wiremind Cargo and Télécom SudParis, conducting research on Reinforcement Learning applied to Combinatorial Optimization, specifically the 3D Bin Packing Problem. I hold a Double Master in Mathematics and Computer Science from Sorbonne University.

item.title: The Discovery of Radium
item.description: An account of the discovery of radium and its properties.
